entry.title: Our services
entry.summary: We provide a number of services that cater to different requirements of your business. For now, the portfolio of our…
entry.content:
We provide a number of services that cater to different requirements of your business. For now, the portfolio of our services includes the following:

1. English<>Hindi, Bangla>Hindi, Bangla>English Translation

2. Audio and Video Transcription in English and Hindi

3. Website designing and maintenance

4. Video sub-titling

For availing any of these services, please contact us!

entry.title: Web Services
entry.summary: Our web services are extensive and selective. We provide different types of website design, maintenance and upgrade services for select…
entry.content:
Our web services are extensive and selective. We provide different types of website design, maintenance and upgrade services for select customers or small enterprises.

For small businesses and micro enterprises running websites and availing of web technology is an unnecessary drag on business consuming time and resources.

We take over the website related tasks on behalf of small and micro enterprises and provide them flawless services. 

To avail this service, businesses need only get in touch with us. We will discuss your requirements and then come out with a solution that will fulfil all your needs with minimum investment of time and resources.

We have helped several small and micro businesses make the best use of internet and web services.

We have the requisite experience and portfolio of services and you can depend on us.

Just get in touch.

entry.title: English-Hindi translation
entry.summary: You can get your document translated in no time and with no effort. A human translator is waiting for your…
entry.content:
You can get your document translated in no time and with no effort. A human translator is waiting for your instructions.

Just fill a simple form to send your instructions, upload your document and let us handle everything. 

You simply have to upload your document, write your instructions and that is all. We will get in touch with you and get the job done.

Our translation process is as easy as 1, 2, 3. Simply upload your document or photo of the text. That’s it. The translation process will begin instantly upon receipt.

English-Hindi Translation is a work that requires expertise and attention. We have a team of translators who are not only capable and efficient but also very fast.

We have expertise in translating websites, documents, presentations etc and we pay close attention to details.

We have an experience of more than 15 years and our translators are seasoned professionals.

We discuss all aspects of your project with you and then try to understand your exact requirements. 

Please Request for Enquiry for discussing your project. Or send your file to us and request for a quote.

entry.title: Transcription
entry.summary: Our transcription services are fast and accurate. We have more than 10 years of experience in transcribing audio and video…
entry.content:
Our transcription services are fast and accurate. We have more than 10 years of experience in transcribing audio and video files.

Our have a small team of experienced transcribers who are not only well-versed with all the nuances of transcription, but are also pretty fast and accurate in their work.

We employ modern tools, but do our work manually, not relying on automation. That is the reason, our transcripts are not only error-free, but also have a human touch.

Getting our team of transcribers to work is fairly easy. You just have to send us a message and set the ball rolling.

We will contact you and discuss with you all the requirements of your project and Proceed from there.

Just send us a message!
